name: shake_head
description:
Make the robot shake its head (yaw left and right).

This performs a head shake gesture by yawing left, then right, then back to neutral.

optional.name: duration
optional.description: Duration for each movement in seconds

optional.name: angle
optional.description: Angle to yaw in degrees (default 20 degrees)

optional.name: speech
optional.description: Optional text to speak via TTS while shaking head
